answers.answer: Hello,Those headaches may be caused by changes in blood pressure during periods of excitement such as what you described. It is not specific to diabetes or Hep C. I do suggest speaking with your personal physician about it to determine if it is something serious that needs treatment.Take care.

question: Hi, I have type 2 and also Hep-c, to what degree is not known yet as I have to have a biopcy still. I have been havingissues when I have sex with my wife, meaning that when I am ready to ejaculate I get a termendous pain in the top of my head like it is going to explode, I only can explain that it feels like a migraine or really bad sinus blockage. It will throb down the left side of my head and last for a while.this will also happen during masturbation. Is this caused by the two symptoms I explained at the beginning or should I be looking at some other cause.
title: will diabetes cause this
